about_the_game:
- Sweet F. Cake game.
- Exclusive art with Sweet F. Cake characters & more!
- Info-cards about Lisa, Alice, Kate and Matilda.
- Walkthrough guidelines for every ending.

Man's Club Package is the most comprehensive access to content from the world of Sweet F.Cake. In addition to the game, the Man's Club edition contains unique arts and additional visual materials with each heroine & more. Immerse yourself in the world of "Sweet F.Cake" at all 200% with Man's Club Package!

DLC Can be found in the root folder of the game

Legal Disclaimers:
All characters are 18 age or older even if specified otherwise

This game contains obscene scenes (partially naked girls and flirting scenes with sexual overtones.)
